snippet: Evgeni Malkin and Patric Hornqvist scored power-play goals in the second period, and the Pittsburgh Penguins handed the visiting Islanders their first loss of the season, 3-1, on Saturday night.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Pittsburgh Penguins defeat New York Islanders, 3-1; other hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Evgeni Malkin and Patric Hornqvist scored power-play goals in the second period, and the Pittsburgh Penguins handed the visiting Islanders their first loss of the season, 3-1, on Saturday night.

headline.main: Islanders, League’s Last Unbeaten Team, Fall at Pittsburgh
headline.print_headline: Islanders, League’s Last Unbeaten Team, Fall at Pittsburgh
